description: red cylinder, printed with little boy dropping a letter in a mail slot; dog at right; "POST OFFICE" flanking coin slot
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on front, in design, in red on a white circle: [Garden]; on front, below mailbox, in white and black: [THE GARDEN CO., LTD. / BAKERS AND CONFECTIONERS]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [Post Office Box with mixed fruit drops (...) MADE IN HONG KONG / Packed by:  THE GARDEN CO., LTD.]
title: "Post Office" still bank
